website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable yet offers good protection, with chin strap that prevents the dreaded headgear spin after a hard hit. The fasteners are its weak points, however.
pros: Almost slip-free during full-contact sparring, reducing need to adjust mid-round
Comfortable to wear, if a bit snug
cons: Velcro fastener can tear, especially competing in sports where clinching and grappling are common
Chin strap is very short, and cinch ring tends to rust after a while

customer_reviews.title: Good headgear, great price
customer_reviews.text: I like this one more than more expensive options I've tried. The padding is a bit stiff, but it's great for the price and I bought used one on Amazon so even cheaper. I usually wear like a sm or med hat size but medium was too small for me so I got a large. I also own an extra large of this headgear and because of the lace system it is pretty adjustable so I'd say the average teen/adult should get a large or extra-large and either can be adjusted to fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This headgear should be the template upon which all other headgear should be patterned. Leather outer material, cloth inside so that it doesn't slip, buckle chin strap, tie back and top - this headgear is almost perfect. I say "almost " because the only improvement I could possibly suggest is that the cheek pads should extend out a little more to give the user's nose a little more protection. Contender does make a headgear similar to this one that has extended cheek pads, but this one is still better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Mingie

customer_reviews.title: Great Headgear
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't feel overly heavy. Nice and light but enough cushion so that when you get caught with a good punch your glad you have it on. I feel my vision is barely compromised if at all which is important to me. The Extra Large fits perfectly over my head and I have pretty thick dreads. I spar about 3-5 times a week. mostly light but also some heavy from time to time. Been using it for about the last 4 months and it's been great! I ordered a medium one at first but returned it as it was way to small but again, I have dreads so that was pretty much my fault!
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Helps When Learning to Dodge a Wrench
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’8” about 160lbs. Opponent was about 5’1” maybe 90lbs. And as Piccolo to his Gohan, by the time we were done, he finally learned to DODGE!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great item and I can use for actual competition due to labelling of USA Boxing.
customer_reviews.author: JOJO B. ISRAEL

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: A bit small space for the ears, but overall very good.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: It’s a pretty firm material that doesn’t absorb a lot of the ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty firm material that doesn’t absorb a lot of the impact. Good quality just not meant for sparring - more for competitions.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Han

customer_reviews.title: Approved headgear by USA boxing and it's very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair so this fits perfectly and when he gets very smelly I throw it in the Washing machine on a gentle cycle so it's very resistant.
customer_reviews.author: PhD Candidate

customer_reviews.title: Good for price. Not great for serious sparring.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. If I had to do it again I'd probably spend the extra money & get some better stuff though (been boxing for a few years). Not much visibility. Great headgear for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I must have been sent a kids size large because the one I received did not fit me. I purchased a adult large in the past and worked fine but this time the large wouldn't even fit my head. I couldn't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Perez

customer_reviews.text: Still not the right size for adults. Needed to be just one size bigger this is great size for a teenager. Not to Comfortable because of the size not really worth the money at least for me. The thickness is good.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: All is great except it's to small for my son. I had to remove the back pad to fit him.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Good headgear for sparring and fighting
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Used it for sparring and will use it for future fights. Lightweight, comfortable and it’s not too fat or anything. My hair gets pulled a bit whenever I take it off tho, but it’s not that big a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Pere

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my first spar. Will update if needed
customer_reviews.author: B CLARK

customer_reviews.title: friend is happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for a friends Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Xtraswt

customer_reviews.title: Protective
customer_reviews.text: Fits tight, I ordered the medium which has a snug fit but once you start sparring with it, you'll realize that it's better a little snug because 1, it will slighlty expand as you sweat and 2, when you take shots to the face you wanted limited movement in the headgear. Furthermore, it offers the protection you need when you do get hit in the face. The view seems slightly restricted but makes up for it in protection which is your number one goal in sparring. Just learn to keep your hands up and you'll be alright.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great headgear for sparring
customer_reviews.text: I love this headgear and unfortunately someone else did too because they stole it :(. I’ve tried different brands like Ringside and even Sabas and I hate the way they fit and how bulky they are. This headgear has protected me so well and fits perfectly. I mean I don’t get hit in the head that much but when I do my noggin is pretty protected. I honestly hate every other brand except this one.i don’t feel like I’m suffocating and on fire after sparring because this is such breathable material and doesn’t irritate my face. Ugh I wish it didn’t get stolen.
customer_reviews.author: P+S

customer_reviews.title: Good deal overall
customer_reviews.text: Love the headgear. just a little upset piece that straps the headgear chinstrap down began to rust.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, no sliding, USA/ABF competition head gear, GREAT PRICE.., GREAT FIT I would recommend to all boxing clubs and or boxers
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. I'm a personal trainer, self defense instructor and mixed martial artist. Didn't like it at first cause it was really tight and was perfect size for my 2 and a half year old. It was a large and I wear a xl for my dot helmet so I was sceptical when I measured my head and it said L. Was going going to return it and get a xl but my fiance told me to stretch it out and sure thing it fits good and takes good damage away from whoever wears it.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Worthy of Competition for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 16 yr old son, he competes in muay thai kickboxing tournaments. It has good padding easy to adjust and is appoved bye the usa boxing. He has had it for 9 months and its held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hines

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, clear view
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this product to amatour boxers and kickboxers. It is one of the best, USA Boxing approved headgears I could find for a very resonable price. I have used it both in practice and competition and have been satisfied. It does move around a little bit but only with what will happen naturally as you adjust it to fit your head and break it in. Overall very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wennersten

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: FIts well, and has decent padding, but the straps could be a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Photog

customer_reviews.title: On time
customer_reviews.text: i liked the fact that the item that i had purchased was not damaged and it arrived on time, just as it was said that the product would have arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend bought this for sparring in boxing. Had to adjust the strings to get it to fit. He likes it.
customer_reviews.author: amberly h.

customer_reviews.title: great protection for the ring
customer_reviews.text: I got this headgear in size small in red. It's a U.S boxing approved headgear which can be used in sanctioned boxing bouts. Does not have much chin protection because of this. It has a hook n loop chin strap and buckle. But it does give you good protection especially on the sides of the forehead where you can be more prone to knockout blows. Made out of good, durable material. Overall with it being economically price, this is a good headgear for sanctioned bouts and sparring sessions. I would recommend this to amateur boxers looking for a headgear that is economically priced and has great protection
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

product_meta.title: Contender Fight Sports Competition Boxing Muay Thai MMA Sparring Head Protection Headgear with Cheeks
product_meta.description: Protect yourself with the Contender Fight Sports Competition Headgear. Get ready for your next bout with this sleek, economically priced and USA Boxing approved headgear!
feature_bullets: The Contender Fight Sports Competition headgear is USA Boxing approved with a sleek contoured design and improved cheek protectors to better protect the head and face
Made of durable leather outer construction and synthetic lining to ensure lasting dexterity and performance with top and back lace closures and a buckle chin strap
This head gear has top quality impact dispersing padding so you can focus safely on sparring and fighting
Top rated headgear for boxing, MMA, Muay Thai and partner contact sport athletes alike to practice and compete
Complete your home or commercial gym with the proper fight gear to get your athletes in shape and competition ready
